member.name: DEVICE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR
member.summary: The DEVICE_POWER_DESCRIPTORstructure describes the power capabilities of a storage device.

member.name: DEVICE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR.Version
member.summary: Contains the size of this structure, in bytes. The value of this member will change as members are added to the structure.

member.name: DEVICE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR.Size
member.summary: Specifies the total size of the data returned, in bytes. This may include data that follows this structure.

member.name: DEVICE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR.DeviceAttentionSupported
member.summary: True if device attention is supported. Otherwise, false.

member.name: DEVICE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR.AsynchronousNotificationSupported
member.summary: True if the device supports asynchronous notifications, delivered viaIOCTL_STORAGE_EVENT_NOTIFICATION. Otherwise, false.

member.name: DEVICE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR.IdlePowerManagementEnabled
member.summary: True if the device has been registered for runtime idle power management. Otherwise, false.

member.name: DEVICE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR.D3ColdEnabled
member.summary: True if the device will be powered off when put into D3 power state. Otherwise, false.

member.name: DEVICE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR.D3ColdSupported
member.summary: True if the platform supports D3ColdEnabled for this device. Otherwise, false.

member.name: DEVICE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR.IdleTimeoutInMS
member.summary: The idle timeout value in milliseconds. This member is ignored unlessIdlePowerManagementEnabled is true.
